text:
Hello :wave:
First time using the HubSpot cli.
Can you fetch directories in HubSpot?
```> hs list
@HubSpot
@marketplace
email-subscription-preferences copy
growth copy
FormHolder.html```
Doing `hs fetch @marketplace` doesn't work.

Hey <@U077R95N3KJ>, do you have the HubSpot VS Code addon installed?
If so - you can open it in the sidebar and right-click on a folder or file that you'd like to fetch. can be helpful if you're new to development.

Also - you can't fetch or modify files from the @marketplace folder and you can't modify files from the <@UDA553DRD> folder.
Arghh thank you so much! I just downloaded the addon.
yes - this is expected. you can't download/modify marketplace files.
